name: eucalypt
description: Reagent compatible-ish Squint-cljs library with no React. Builds tiny frontends.

scripts.build: npm run demo:build; npm run dist:build
scripts.test: npm run test:compile && vitest run --config src/test/vitest.config.js
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:compile && vitest run --reporter=default --reporter=json --outputFile=./test-results.json --config src/test/vitest.config.js
scripts.demo:build: cd src/demo && squint compile && vite build && SRC=small.html vite build && SRC=games.html vite build
scripts.report: pnpm clean; echo "Branch: `git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD`"; pnpm test | grep -v squint | grep -E '(pass|fail)'; echo "LOC: `wc -l src/eucalypt.cljs`"; pnpm build | grep docs
